snippet: People who qualify for the T.S.A.’s PreCheck program are chosen from the top ranks of elite fliers who qualify for preferential treatment in the security process itself.
abstract: Top-tier business travelers, who generate the most revenue for airlines, are getting additional benefits like elite access to security lines; concurrently, the Transportation Security Administration has begun a PreCheck program, giving qualifying fliers preferential treatment through the entire security process, based on the idea that a known traveler poses a lower security risk.
lead_paragraph: People who qualify for the T.S.A.’s PreCheck program are chosen from the top ranks of elite fliers who qualify for preferential treatment in the security process itself.

headline.seo: T.S.A.’s PreCheck Program Gives V.I.P. Treatment Through Security
headline.main: V.I.P. Treatment Eases the Way Through Security
headline.print_headline: V.I.P. Treatment Eases the Way Through Security
